markdown:
<title
    level="1"
    right="Feat 1"
    pfs="Standard"
>
[Wind Pillow](/Feats.aspx?ID=3933) <actions string="" />
</title>

<traits>
<trait label="Sylph" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=311" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

<row gap="tiny">**Source** [Impossible Lands](/Sources.aspx?ID=146) pg. 31</row>

</column>

---

The winds have whispered to you all your life, and the essence of air itself helps you at times, making you somewhat buoyant when you're suspended in space. Treat all [falls](/Rules.aspx?ID=402) as though they were 10 feet less than the actual distance traveled. You also gain the [Powerful Leap](/Feats.aspx?ID=820) skill feat, even if you don't meet that feat's prerequisites.
name: Wind Pillow
